body: The original issue here outlines using the `install` function in #748 to save active study data (and `uninstall` to alter that data). After discussion with @Osmose, we've decided to alter the approach in that addon installation and 'starting' a study will live as separate functions. This affords us the ability to use un/install addon functions in other actions later.
